product_name: The North Face Momentum Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Delivering lightweight warmth and great breathability, the Momentum Jacket from The North Face keeps up with your every move thanks to soft TKA Superstretch fabric. TKA Superstretch fabric features a smooth, non-pilling outer face, warm fleecy inner face and 4-way stretch; fabric also wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Full-length front zipper features an inside windflap that doubles as a chin guard; tall collar keeps neck warm. Elastic cuffs; zippered hand pockets; zippered chest pocket. The North Face Momentum Jacket features a performance fit that lies close to the body without being too tight. Closeout.
short_description: Delivering lightweight warmth and great breathability, the Momentum Jacket from The North Face keeps up with your every move thanks to soft TKA Superstretch fabric.
